pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"raspbian-简介","children":"Raspbian 简介"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Raspbian 是专门用于 ARM 卡片式计算机 Raspberry Pi® “树莓派”的操作系统，
其基于 Debian 开发，针对 Raspberry Pi 硬件优化。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Raspbian 并非由树莓派的开发与维护机构 The Raspberry Pi Foundation
“树莓派基金会”官方支持。其维护者是一群 Raspberry Pi 硬件和 Debian 项目的爱好者。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"注：Raspbian 系统由于从诞生开始就基于（为了 armhf，也必须基于）当时还是
testing 版本的 7.0/wheezy，所以 Raspbian 不倾向于使用 stable/testing
表示版本。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"使用说明","children":"使用说明"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["首先通过 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"uname -m"}]," 确定你使用的系统的架构。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["编辑镜像站后，请使用",["$r","code",null,{"children":"sudo apt-get update"}],"命令，更新软件源列表，同时检查您的编辑是否正确。"]}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"armv7l","children":"armv7l"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list","menus":[{"title":"选择你的 Raspbian 对应的 Debian 版本","items":[["Debian 13 (trixie)",{"release_name":"trixie"}],["Debian 12 (bookworm)",{"release_name":"bookworm"}],["Debian 11 (bullseye)",{"release_name":"bullseye"}]]},{"title":"启用源码镜像","items":[["否",{"enable_source":"# "}],["是",{"enable_source":""}]]},{"title":"启用 multi-arch aarch64","items":[["否",{"enable_aarch64":"# "}],["是",{"enable_aarch64":""}]]}],"code":"deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/raspbian/ {{release_name}} main non-free contrib rpi
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/raspbian/ {{release_name}} main non-free contrib rpi

{{enable_aarch64}}deb [arch=arm64] {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/multiarch/ {{release_name}} main","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["注意：网址末尾的",["$r","code",null,{"children":"raspbian"}],"重复两次是必须的。因为 Raspbian 的仓库中除了 APT 软件源还包含其他代码。APT 软件源不在仓库的根目录，而在",["$r","code",null,{"children":"raspbian/"}],"子目录下。"]}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"aarch64","children":"aarch64"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["aarch64 用户可直接参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/debian/","children":"Debian 帮助"}]]}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"raspberry-镜像","children":"raspberry 镜像"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["对于两个架构，编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/raspi.list"}]," 文件，这需要查看 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/raspberrypi/","children":"Raspberrypi 帮助"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"相关链接","children":"相关链接"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"raspbian-链接","children":"Raspbian 链接"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[" Raspbian 主页：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.raspbian.org","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://www.raspbian.org"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["文档：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.raspbian.org/RaspbianDocumentation","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://www.raspbian.org/RaspbianDocumentation"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Bug 反馈：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.raspbian.org/RaspbianBugs","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://www.raspbian.org/RaspbianBugs"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[" 镜像列表: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.raspbian.org/RaspbianMirrors","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://www.raspbian.org/RaspbianMirrors"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"树莓派链接","children":"树莓派链接"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["树莓派基金会主页：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.raspberrypi.org/","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://www.raspberrypi.org/"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["树莓派基金会论坛 Raspberry Pi OS 版块：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://raspberrypi.org/forums/viewforum.php?f=66","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://raspberrypi.org/forums/viewforum.php?f=66"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"关于本文档","children":"关于本文档"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["本文档内容的原始版本由 Raspberry Pi
中文社区“树莓爱好者论坛”提供。按照 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/cn/","rel":"nofollow","children":"知识共享署名 - 非商业性使用
3.0
中国大陆许可协议"}]," 授权清华大学镜像站使用。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["TUNA 提供的修改版本同样使用 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/cn/","rel":"nofollow","children":"知识共享署名 - 非商业性使用
3.0
中国大陆许可协议"}],"。"]}]]}]

meta.title: Raspbian 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
